Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity.scope

This package contains validation model implementation classes for scope related validation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AeFaultHandlersValidator.IAeCatchValidatorSpec Inner interface for AeCatchValidatorSpec definition
 

Class Summary
AeBaseCatchValidator Base class for catch validation.
AeBaseCatchValidator.AeCatchSpec Inner class for a catch specification.
AeBPWSCatchValidator model provides the validation for the catchDef
AeBPWSFaultHandlersValidator model provides validation for the BPWS faultHandlers def
AeBPWSFaultHandlersValidator.AeBPWSCatchValidatorSpec Nested class to create a object of AeBPWSCatchValidatorSpec for comparing the two catch element.
AeCatchAllValidator model for validating the catchAll def
AeCompensationHandlerValidator model provides validation for the compensationHandler def
AeCorrelationSetsValidator model provides validation for the correlationSets def
AeCorrelationSetValidator moddel provides validation for a correlation set def
AeEventHandlersValidator model provides validation for the event handlers def
AeFaultHandlersValidator model provides validation for the faultHandlers def
AeFaultHandlersValidator.AeBaseCatchValidatorSpec Nested base class to create a object of AeCatchValidatorSpec for comparing the two catch elements.
AeMessageExchangesValidator model provides validation for the messageExchanges def
AeMessageExchangeValidator model provides validation for the messageExchange def
AeOnEventValidator model provides validation for the onEvent model
AePartnerLinksValidator Model provides validation for the partnerlinks model
AePartnerLinkValidator model provides validation for the partnerLink def
AeRepeatEveryValidator model provides validation for repeatEvery activity
AeTerminationHandlerValidator model provides validation for termination handler
AeVariablesValidator model provides validation for variables def
AeWSBPELCatchValidator Adds the validation to handle faultVariable resolution rules
AeWSBPELCompensationHandlerValidator model provides validation for the compensationHandler def
AeWSBPELFaultHandlersValidator model provides validation for the WSBPEL faultHandlers def
AeWSBPELPartnerLinkValidator Extends base class to check that import exists for the PartnerLinkType namespace.
AeWSBPELTerminationHandlerValidator Model provides validation for the terminationHandler def.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity.scope Description

This package contains validation model implementation classes for scope related validation.
